column2: # Here you can load in (or simulate) and clean the data (you may need to do the cleaning in a separate R script - this is up to you).

lbls <- c("Streaming Services
(Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer...) 
", "Personal Recommendations 
from Friends/Family
")
lbls <- paste(lbls, pct) # add percents to labels
pie(slices, labels = lbls, col=rainbow(length(lbls)), main= "What is your primary way to discover new music from new artists? \n (Select one that best answers the question)")
